app.name: MzeeChakula
app.subtitle: Elderly Nutrition Planning for Uganda
app.tagline: Smart meal planning for healthy aging

home.description: AI-powered nutrition planning for elderly care using locally sourced Ugandan foods

features.title: Features
features.aiPoweredDesc: Using advanced machine learning models for accurate caloric needs prediction
features.localFoodsDesc: Culturally relevant meals using locally available Ugandan foods
features.offlineDesc: Works without internet using lightweight offline models
features.personalizedDesc: Tailored to age, health conditions, and dietary needs

predict.title: New Nutrition Prediction
predict.chatDescription: Use our conversational AI assistant with voice support

regions.northern: Northern Uganda (Acholi, Lango, Karamoja, West Nile)

settings.title: Settings
settings.clearDataConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all saved data?

chat.title: Chat Assistant
chat.subtitle: Talk to our AI assistant for personalized nutrition guidance
chat.greeting: Hello! I'm your nutrition assistant. I'm here to help plan healthy meals. How can I help you today?
chat.welcome: Welcome! Let's get started with some information about you.
chat.greetingWithInfo: Thank you for that information! Let me ask you a few more questions.
chat.askAge: How old are you? Please choose: 60-70 years, 70-80 years, or 80+ years.
chat.askRegion: Which region of Uganda are you from? Central (Kampala/Buganda), Western (Mbarara/Ankole), Eastern (Mbale/Busoga), or Northern (Gulu/Acholi)?
chat.askCondition: Do you have any health conditions? For example: hypertension, diabetes, anemia, osteoporosis, heart disease, kidney disease, arthritis, or are you generally healthy?
chat.askSeason: What season are we in? Dry season or wet season (rainy)?
chat.askNutrition: What foods did you eat today? You can say something like 'I had matooke and beans' or 'fish with vegetables'.
chat.demographicsComplete: Great! I have your basic information. Now let's talk about your meals.
chat.nutritionReceived: Thank you! I've recorded your meal information.
chat.askConfirm: Is all this information correct? Say 'yes' to continue or 'no' to start over.
chat.processingPrediction: Perfect! Let me calculate your personalized nutrition recommendations...
chat.didNotUnderstand: I'm sorry, I didn't quite understand that. Could you please rephrase?
chat.restartConversation: Let's start over from the beginning.
chat.processingDescription: Analyzing your information and generating recommendations
chat.instruction1: Answer questions naturally in your own words
chat.instruction2: Use voice input by clicking the microphone button
chat.instruction3: Enable voice output to hear responses read aloud
chat.instruction4: Perfect for elderly users or those who prefer conversation

pricing.title: Pricing Plans
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that best fits your needs
pricing.faqQ1: How do I upgrade my plan?
pricing.faqA1: You can upgrade your plan at any time through this page. The change takes effect immediately.
pricing.faqQ2: Can I switch between monthly and yearly billing?
pricing.faqA2: Yes! Switch anytime. Yearly billing offers 17% savings compared to monthly.
pricing.faqA3: We accept Mobile Money (MTN, Airtel), bank transfers, and major credit cards.
pricing.faqA4: The Community plan is free forever with basic features. Paid plans start immediately upon selection.

faq2.question: Can I change my plan later?
faq2.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately and we'll prorate any charges.

faq3.question: Is there a free trial?
faq3.answer: Yes! The Community plan is free forever with basic features. Paid plans offer a 14-day money-back guarantee.

faq4.question: Do you offer discounts for NGOs?
faq4.answer: Yes, we offer special pricing for non-profits, NGOs, and healthcare organizations. Contact us for custom pricing.

pricing.contactUs: Our team is here to help you find the perfect plan for your needs.
pricing.contactDescription: For large healthcare facilities or NGOs, we can create a custom enterprise plan.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
